    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      • removeLevel

        public void removeLevel(int levelNum)
        Removes the level from the map this is usually paired with a update in the DB, to sync the level. This will be used to remove levels that don't need to exist as no players are on them.
        Parameters:
        levelNum - the level num

      • addLevel

        public void addLevel(LevelInterface level)
        Adds the level outright.
        Parameters:
        level - the level

      • switchFloors

                         int from,
                         int to)
        Moves a player from one level to another.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to move
        from - the level the player is moved from
        to - the level the player is to be moved to
